thread.title: 7 things in The Only Way Is Marbs that have got us excited about the new series
thread.title_full: 7 things in The Only Way Is Marbs that have got us excited about the new series

title: 7 things in The Only Way Is Marbs that have got us excited about the new series
text:
7 things in The Only Way Is Marbs that have got us excited about the new series 7 things in The Only Way Is Marbs that have got us excited about the new series 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Our favourite Essex crew are back which means your Sunday and Wednesday nights are now complete again. The new series – The Only Way is Marbs promises to be full of flirtation, arguments and awkward moments. 
Here’s what we’re excited about for the rest of the new series after tonight. 
1. New people. 
— Now Magazine (@NowMag) October 4, 2015 
2. This trend we never knew about. Being a mermaid is so on-trend right now #TOWIE 
— OK! Magazine (@OK_Magazine) October 4, 2015 
3. The word ‘flanter’ (flirtatious banter). Flanter is a sick word #TOWIE 
— Tom Haynes (@tomtankbush) October 4, 2015 
4. Nanny Pat partying it up in Marbs. WE… ARE… BACK! #TOWIE is on @ITVBe after the break and this time… Nanny Pat is in Marbs… pic.twitter.com/Yc3wUEmlCe 
— Only Way Is Essex (@OnlyWayIsEssex) October 4, 2015 
5. Ferne sticking her nose into everyone’s business again – inevitably leading to some explosive drama. Oh Ferne when will you learn (ITVBe/Screenshot) Ferne has an awful lot to say about everyone else #TOWIE 
— PAULY•C (@paulchambers81) October 4, 2015 
6. TOWIE’s only rock solid couple restoring our faith in love. Arg sticking up for Lydia 🙅🏻💁🏻👊🏻 #TOWIE
